title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 does not work on some fields in the help search
OB: When in eclipse with DBCS locale, select Search -> Help from the menu bar. In the Help Search window, click on the first text field and press Ctrl+F1.
EB: When Ctrl+F1 is pressed on the first text field in the Help Search window, no help pop up screen is displayed. This issue occurs on all DBCS languages.
SR: The expected behavior is for a help pop up screen to be displayed when Ctrl+F1 is pressed on any text field in the Help Search window. Please fix this issue so that the help pop up screen is displayed on the first text field as well.
